articles.title: Orbital harmony limits late arrival of water on TRAPPIST-1 planets - Phys.Org
articles.description: Seven Earth-sized planets orbit the star TRAPPIST-1 in near-perfect harmony, and U.S. and European researchers have used that harmony to determine how much physical abuse the planets could have withstood in their infancy.
